name: FoodSmashers
description:
A jam game for the Protoshi competition on MakeGamesSA.

I'm quite fond of Overcooked, but I wanted to take it in a bit more of a restaurant-sim direction.

Controls

  • Player1 - WASD for movement. T to interact
  • Player2 - Arrow keys for movement. Num1 to interact

Recipes

  • Garden salad - chopped tomato and chopped lettuce on a plate
  • Tomato soup - 3 chopped tomatoes heated in a pot, served on a plate
  • Potato soup - 3 chopped potatoes heated in a pot, served on a plate

Credits for stuff that I made use of:

  • Use of @Squidcor's Framework and Soundbank libraries
  • Music: "Funshine" by Kevin McLeod
  • Chopping vegetables sound by ancorapazzo on freesound.org
